Reviews.Title: Bliss
Reviews.Author: dmf9436
Reviews.Content: After a lifetime with Nikon I felt I had to try this camera and I don't regret it for a minute. It is not a polyvalent camera for every situation - it is poor at fast action shots and moving targets - but if you are doing anything else the colours and the sharpness are simply stunning. It takes a while to get used to and you need to invest some time in understanding how it works but the dividends are well worth it. I would thoroughly recommed this camera to anyone who is interested in photography.

ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm X-Pro 1 16MP Digital Camera with 35mm F1.4 Lens
